Articles.Content: I can't figure out what I'm doing wrong. I'm on Minmus with an engineer, facing the sun and with a clear view to Kerbin. I've placed down two solar panels, a mystery goo, an antenna and a control station, all practically touching. Everything including the solar panels says "unpowered." The station picks up needing 3 power, but has 0 available. What am I missing?
Nevermind. I was slightly out of view from Kerbin. As soon as it entered view, everything started working.
